futureCases.description: We can find a student who can relax at the end of the term
We can find a student who needs to do more AI problems.
We can find a student who does not need to do more AI problems.
We can find a student who needs to try more challenge problems
We can find a student who does not need to try more challenge problems
We can find a student who should consider dropping the course
We no longer issue drop warnings past the middle of the term.
We can find a student who should not consider dropping the course
We can find a student who needs encouragement
We can find a student who does not need encouragement
